summary: SUDDEN CATASTROPHIC FAILURE OF THE TRANSMISSION ON MY 1996 WINDSTAR, 86,000 MI. PROPER MAINTENENCE HAD BEEN DONE.  I SEE THERE ARE MANY COMPLAINTS HERE WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.
